{{Wireless embedded system |brand=PESI |model=WA211P |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=02/06/2002 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=PQP-WA211P-X |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atmel |cpu1_model=AT76C510 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=256 KiB |fla1_brand=Atmel |fla1_model=AT29LV020-20TC |ram1=512 KiB |ram1_brand=GSI |ram1_model=GS74108TP-15 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atmel |wi1_chip1_model=AT76C510 |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=HFA3861 |wi1_chip3_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip3_model=HFA3683A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=LSI |eth_chip2_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=10M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=schematics, block diagram |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} "1000WA211PA0-01" is etched onto the bottom of the main board.
The power adapter shown in the FCC photos is a '''DVE''' DSA-0101F-05 A :(100-240VAC ~ 47/63Hz, 0.3A -> 5VDC, 2.0A)
